dmca.title: Big Screen Sequel DMCA Notice
dmca.body:
To Whom It May Concern:

As per your request, I have formatted my DMCA complaint dated May 7, 2007 to conform with your submission guidelines.

1. This complaint covers the unauthorized images of actress Kimberley Kates from the film "Armstrong. We are filing this complaint on behalf of the Copyright owner. Please see the attached Cease and Desist letter, and Library of Congress Information, which will affirm our authority to file this complaint.

2. The following links are in violation of DMCA. Attached please find the letter from the owner of the copyright for the film in violation "Armstrong." We are duly authorized to act on their behalf.

http://www.bitenova.nl/tt/f2s4b
http://www.btmon.com/Porn/Movies/Kimberley_Kates_naked_in_a_bathroom_vidcaps.torrent.html
http://www.torrentvalley.com/download_torrent_600405.html

The following links from Google Images and the search item "Kimberley Kates" are also in copyright violation of the film "Armstrong." These are nude images of Kimberley Kates getting out of a shower and are being illegally used and in violation of the DMCA. Attached you will find the Cease and Desist Letter as well as the Library of Congress information on the above-referenced film "Armstrong."

http://images.google.com/imgres?imgurl=http://www.celebsmovies-online.com/m_pics/mq/tnKimberleyKates1.jpg&imgrefurl=http://www.celebsmovies-online.com/Kimberley-Kates-Nude/Kimberley-Kates.html&h=120&w=185&sz=6&hl=xx-elmer&start=2&sig2=m4pmrh0iUJPpky5la4BnUw&um=1&tbnid=fgU6mypVZRwI1M&tbnh=66&th2%26svnum%sD10%26um%sD1%26hl%sDxx-elmer%26lr%sDlang_en%26ie%3DUTF-8%26oe%sDISO-8859-1%26safe%3Doff%26sDN
http://images.google.com/imgres?imgurl=http://www.freejoin.net/mb/celebrities/free/nude/gallery/k/kimberley_kates/images/tn_kimberley_kates-1.jpg&imgrefurl=http://www.freejoin.net/mb/celebrities/free/nude/pics/kimberley_kates.html&h=87&w=120&sz=5&hl=xx-elmer&start=10&sig2=gakLym+p1SA-1czfg_kVA&um=1&tbnid=LEF5pOI5J6qTdM:&tbnh=64&tbn88&ei=JewsRoqAEcLgiwGKqZmKAQ&prev=/images%3Fq%3D%2522kimberley%2Bkates%2522%26svnum%sD10%26um%3D1%26hl%3Dxx=elmer%26lr%3Dlang_en%26ie%sDUTF-8%26oe%sDISO-8859-1%26safe%3Doff%26sa%3DN http://images.google.com/imgres?imgurl=http://thumbs.videos2stars.com/v2s/853/4.jpg&imgrefurl=http://www.videos2stars.com/videos-kimberley-kates-309-1237.html&h=118&w=160&sz=8&hl=xx-elmer&start=5&sig2=zwXMcoZTMnsHskdK9WjUmg&um=1&tbnid=8Gc13lHsPgWpUM:&tbnh=72522%26svnum%sD10%26um%sDI%26hl%sDxx-elmer%26lr%sDlang_en%26ie%3DUTF-8%26oe%3DISO-8859-1%26safe%Doff%26sa%sDN Below are a number of other links that were found that are also in violation of copyright of the film "Armstrong". There still may be a few more links. We ask that you conduct a thorough search to please remove them all immediately. http://images.google.com/imgres?imgurl=http://thumbs.videos2stars.com/v2s8533.jpg&imgregurl=http://www.videos2stars.com/videos-kimberley-kates-309-1237.html&h=118&w=160&sz=8&hl=xx-elmer&start=6&sig2=od44h4hglXwBK6b5Uc7opQ&um=1&tbnid=cJpcrIZj7DRFYM:&tbnh=72&tbnw=98&ei=JewsRoqAEcLgiwGKqZmKAQ&prev=/images%3Fq%3D%2522kimberley%2Bkates%2522%26synum%sD10%26um%sD1%26hl%sDxx-elmer%26lr%sDlang_en%26ie%3DUTF-8%26oe%3DISO-8859-1%26safe%Doff%26sa%sDN http://images.google.com/imgres?imgurl=http://www.celebsmovies-online.com/m_pics/mq/tnKimberleyKates2.jpg&imgrefurl=http://www.celebsmovies-online.com/Kimberley-Kates-Nude/Kimberley-Kates.html&h=120&w=185&sz=10&hl=xx-elmer&start=1&sig2=UXXhUgNUaZQnB4GIgVt_Hug&um=1&tbnid=0KsRweRWOCYeGM:&tbnh=66&tbnw=102&ei=JewsRoqAEcLgiwGKqZmKAQ&prev=/images%3Fq%3D%2522kimberley%2Bkates%2522%26synum%sD10%26um%sD1%26hl%sDxx-elmer%26lr%sDlang_en%26ie%3DUTF-8%26oe%3DISO-8859-1%26safe%Doff%26sa%sDN http://images.google.com/imgres?imgurl=http://www.celebrityvideo.ru/screenshot/k/Kates%2520Kimberley_Armstrong_640_480.jpg&imgrefurl=http://www.celebrityvideo.ru/Kates_Kimberley.html&h=960&w=1280&sz=60&hl=xx-elmer&start=30&sig2=zzV9ICQABngY5VSJGCoiVg&um=1&tbnid=S5mVtjvny6MtaM:&tbnh=113&tbnw=150&ei=S-88RuSvNKKCjAHIzvyOAQ&prev=/images%3Fq%3D%2522kimberley%2Bkates%2522%26synum%sD10%26um%sD1%26hl%sDxx-elmer%26lr%sDlang_en%26ie%3DUTF-8%26oe%3DISO-8859-1%26safe%Doff%26sa%sDN http://images.google.com/imgres?imgurl=http://www.les-stars-nues.biz/v2s/thumbs/853/big.jpg&imgrefurl=http://www.les-stars-nues.biz/videos-stars-nues-videos-Kimberley-Kates-309-1.html&h=364&w=241&sz=15&hl=xx-elmer&start=28&sig2=DIYdAhm729RBC_UxjmcQIg&um=1&tbnid=HzQHJhXjXt1QnM:&tbnh=121&tbnw=80&ei=S-88RuSvNKKCjAHIzvyOAQ&prev=/images%3Fq%3D%2522kimberley%2Bkates%2522%26synum%sD10%26um%sD1%26hl%sDxx-elmer%26lr%sDlang_en%26ie%3DUTF-8%26oe%3DISO-8859-1%26safe%Doff%26sa%sDN http://images.google.com/imgres?imgurl=http://www.les-stars-nues.biz/v2s/thumbs/853/8.jpg&imgrefurl=http://www.les-stars-nues.biz/photos-Eva-Mendes-508-nue.html&h=118&w=160&sz=7&hl=xx=elmer&start=16&sig2=x_uCgUOCjLmqDKSVr8WCwA&um=1&tbnid=Cs7CzSG9mNJzsM:tbnh=72&tbnw=98&ei=JewsRoqAEcLgiwGKqZmKAQ&prev=/images%3Fq%3D%2522kimberley%2Bkates%2522%26synum%sD10%26um%sD1%26hl%sDxx-elmer%26lr%sDlang_en%26ie%3DUTF-8%26oe%3DISO-8859-1%26safe%Doff%26sa%sDN http://images.google.com/imgres?imgurl=http://www.celebrityvideo.ru/screenshot/k/Kates%2520Kimberley_Highway_624_480.jpg&imgrefurl=http://www.celebrityvideo.ru/Kates_Kimberley.html&h=960&w=1248&sz=106&hl=xx-elmer&start=12&sig2=y9YRGknotGJJr_kV-LrYZQ&tbnid=yW2ahkXbTw9aPM:&tbnh=115&tbnw=150&ei=6u88RvID6HQiQHipZRK&prev=/images%3Fq%3D%2522kimberley%2Bkates%2522%26synum%sD10%26um%sD1%26hl%sDxx-elmer%26lr%sDlang_en%26ie%3DUTF-8%26oe%3DISO-8859-1%26safe%Doff%26sa%sDN http://images.google.com/imgres?imgurl=http://media.cash-program.com/ban/index.php%3Fsite%3D9%26format%sD120x600&imgrefurl=http://kimberley-kates-nue.pia3.info/&h=600&w=120&sz=44&hl=xx-elmer&start=44&sig2=v7rgmleOIF76qAV4yLH7A&um=1&tbnid=2tTc8r2dgFw45M:&tbnh=135&tbnw=27&ei=VP8RpCGCpLCiwG-sO16&prev=/images%3Fq%3D%2522kimberley%2Bkates%2522%26synum%sD10%26um%sD1%26hl%sDxx-elmer%26lr%sDlang_en%26ie%3DUTF-8%26oe%3DISO-8859-1%26safe%Doff%26sa%sDN 

You may contact me directly at [Private]@bigscreenent.com

4. I have a good faith belief that use of the copyrighted materials described above on the allegedly infringing webpages is not authorized by the copyright owner, its agent, or the law.

5. I swear, under penalty of perjury consistent with United States Code Title 17, Section 512, that the information in the notification is accurate and that I am the copyright owner or am authorized to act on behalf of the owner of an exclusive right that is allegedly infringed."

Thank you for your prompt attention to this matter. Should you have any questions, please contact me.

Regards,

[Private]
President
DZ: rh

Attachments
